name: playwright-hydrid-framework
description: Playwright installation - 01 - Nodejs - 02 - VS Code - 03 - Create project folder (ex: playwright_hybrid_framework_nopcommerce) - 04 - Install playwright using terminal:	> npm init playwright@latest 	 - To check playwright version:	> npm playwright -v 	 - package.json: node project management file to manage all dependencies 	 - playwright.config.js: playwright configuration file 	 - tests folder: contains all the playright tests  - 05 - Install Playright VS Code extension: Playwright Test for VSCode
